name: Super Mario Clouds
description:
Super Mario Clouds is an old Mario Brothers cartridge which I modified to erase everything but the clouds. Hold down the right arrow on your keyboard (just as in Super Mario)

Since I do not touch the graphics from the original cartridge, the clouds you are seeing are the actual factory soldered clouds that come on the Mario cartridge. There is no generation loss and no "copying", because I did not even have to make a copy. Wasss up.
